questions.question: You walk into a car dealership. The dealer is friendly, and you enjoy the experience. Which color car do you choose?
You receive job offers from two companies. One offers higher pay, the other better work-life balance. Which do you choose?
You inherit a large sum of money from a distant relative. What do you do first?
You're planning a vacation with friends, but they want to go somewhere you're not interested in. What do you do?
You decide to start a new hobby. Which one do you choose?
A friend asks you to help them move on your only day off. What do you do?
You get a chance to relocate to a new city for a job promotion. What do you do?
You find out that your best friend is moving across the country. How do you react?

choices.label: d
choices.text: Offer to help with the move
